Player History
Injured on 4/23/1965 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 4/22/1968 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Boston on 5/5/1969...
Drafted in 2nd round, 25th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1972...
Traded from Philadelphia to Baltimore on 2/6/1972 (Going to PHI: P D. Hamilton. Going to BAL: LF D. Collins)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/25/1975, off Lew Krausse Jr. (BOS)...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 5/6/1977...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1978...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 6/21/1979...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against New York (A) on 4/11/1980...
